agreement.text: By clicking Create, you agree to the Mezon

errors.nameRequired: A name is required to create your new {type}.
errors.urlRequired: URL is required to create your new application.
errors.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., https://example.com).
errors.createFailed: Failed to create application or missing ID in response

notifications.shadowModeInfo: In shadow mode, the bot can receive all messages sent to the creator, but it cannot send messages.

shadowConfirm.title: Please confirm if you would like to enable Shadow Bot mode?
shadowConfirm.message: In this mode, the bot can receive all messages sent to the creator but cannot send messages.

generalInformation.title: General Information
generalInformation.subtitle: What should we call your creation? What amazing things does it do? What icon should represent it across Mezon? Tell us here!

agreement.text: By clicking Create, you agree to the Mezon

description.label: Description (maximum 400 characters)
description.subtitle: Your description will appear in the About Me section of your Bot
description.placeholder: Write a short description of your Bot

token.newTokenWarning: This is your new token. Copy and store it safely, you won't be able to see it again.
token.securityInfo: For security purposes, tokens can only be viewed once, when created. If you forgot or lost access to your token, please regenerate a new one.

errors.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., https://example.com).
errors.clientNotInitialized: Client or file is not initialized

installation.title: Installation
installation.subtitle: Choose how users will install your app. Create an installation link, choose which installation context to support, and define the scopes and permissions you want to request.

installLink.title: Install Link
installLink.description: Use our provided install link or register a custom one. If you choose a custom link, users who add your app will be redirected to your URL instead of the Add App flow in Mezon.

publicClient.title: Public client
publicClient.description: Public clients cannot maintain the confidentiality of their client credentials (i.e. desktop/mobile applications that do not use a server to make requests)

resetSecretPopup.title: Regenerate Secret Key?
resetSecretPopup.warning: Your app will stop working until you update the secret key in your app code.

toasts.addRedirectUri: Please add at least one redirect URI before resetting the secret key!

applicationsPage.title: Applications
applicationsPage.subtitle: to customize and extend Mezon for millions of users.

oauth2.title: OAuth2
oauth2.subtitle: Use Mezon as an authorization system or use our API on behalf of your users. Add a redirect URI, pick your scopes, roll a D20 for good luck, and go!

generator.title: OAuth2 URL Generator
generator.description: Generate an invite link for your application by picking the scopes and permissions it needs to function. Then, share the URL to others!

redirects.title: Redirects
redirects.description: You must specify at least one URI for authentication to work. If you pass a URI in an OAuth request, it must exactly match one of the URIs you enter here.

toasts.fillAllInputs: Please fill all inputs with valid URIs!
